title: Retrieve options for search parameters
description: Retrieves a list of options for a search filter. The list of options may depend on the value of another filter.

query.name: dependent_value
query.description: The value of the dependent parameter, if any.

query.name: key
query.description: The key, as specified in the ExternalOptionsKey field when return_metadata=true is passed to a search API.

returns.description: Collection of <AttributeOption> A list of values and display values.

fields.name: Value
fields.description: The value of the item as a string.

fields.name: Display
fields.description: What should be displayed for this value (often the same).

fields.name: Count
fields.description: How many child elements are available.
